remarks: Ring homomorphisms preserve addition.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 3-Jan-2011.)
statement:
rnghomadd.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
rnghomadd.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rnghomadd.3 $e |- J = ( 1st ` S ) $.
rngohomadd $p |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps /\ F e. ( R RngHom S ) ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( F ` ( A G B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) J ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
